bug.author: igormis
bug.description: After testing the script train_textcat.py on the branch feature/textpair everything with the training seems ok now. However, the model cannot be saved at the end, here is the traceback: <denchmark-code>Traceback (most recent call last): File "train_textcat.py", line 237, in <module> plac.call(main) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/plac_core.py", line 328, in call cmd, result = parser.consume(arglist) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/plac_core.py", line 207, in consume return cmd, self.func(*(args + varargs + extraopts), **kwargs) File "train_textcat.py", line 121, in main nlp.to_disk(output_dir) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/spacy/language.py", line 796, in to_disk util.to_disk(path, serializers, exclude) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/spacy/util.py", line 627, in to_disk writer(path / key) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/spacy/language.py", line 794, in <lambda> serializers[name] = lambda p, proc=proc: proc.to_disk(p, exclude=["vocab"]) File "pipes.pyx", line 201, in spacy.pipeline.pipes.Pipe.to_disk File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/spacy/util.py", line 627, in to_disk writer(path / key) File "pipes.pyx", line 199, in spacy.pipeline.pipes.Pipe.to_disk.lambda6 File "/content/spacy-pytorch-transformers/spacy_pytorch_transformers/_tokenizers.py", line 60, in to_bytes self.prepare_for_serialization() File "/content/spacy-pytorch-transformers/spacy_pytorch_transformers/_tokenizers.py", line 313, in prepare_for_serialization vocab_path = Path(self.vocab_file) AttributeError: 'SerializableXLNetTokenizer' object has no attribute 'vocab_file' </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: Could you run pip list and double-check that you have the latest version of the model XLNet model package installed?
I have: spacy-pytorch-transformers 0.1.1 and install xlnet model using python -m spacy download en_pytt_xlnetbasecased_lg
